law.catch_line: When the Commission receives a claim, the Commission:...

text.section:
When the Commission receives a claim, the Commission:
may investigate the claim; and
on application of any party to the claim, shall order a hearing.

section.section:
The Commission shall make or deny an award within 30 days:
after the mailing of the notice of the filing of a claim; or
if a hearing is held, after the hearing is concluded.

The decision shall be recorded in the principal office of the Commission, and a copy of the decision shall be sent by first-class mail to each party's attorney of record or, if the party is unrepresented, to the party.
